message: Let's make a deal, Bob. I take $70, you take $30. It's a good deal for you in the first round.
Let's be fair, Alice. I take $60, you take $40. It's better than waiting and getting a worse deal.
Bob, my offer is getting worse for you each round! Let's be realistic, I'll take $60, you take $40. It's better than what you'll get in round 4.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm taking a smaller cut to end this now.  $55 to me, $45 to you. Take it before it's even worse for both of us!
Okay Bob, I'm feeling generous.  I'll take the same split you just offered - $55 for me, $45 for you.  Don't be greedy, Bob! This is your last chance for a decent amount!
